Bootloader update

To upgrade the bootloader you must follow these steps:

  1. Request the correct bootloader file for your device with DPTechnics support: info@dptechnics.com
  2. Select the file you received from the DPTechnics support desk.
  3. Press the Update bootloader button and wait for your device to boot again.
WARNINGS
  • Do not power off the device during update, this may break your device.
  • The DPT-Board will restart after the installation is finished.
  • Make sure to upload the correct bootloader, a wrong file may break your device.
